mods.li: Science Never Stops: Ambition of the Cosmic

value.description: An advanced pistol that shoots little clumps of pure hatred at high velocities.\n\nThe unbalanced pistol is a favorite of Torture Liquid Union empires, primarily because of the severe pain it inflicts.

A fully automatic rifle that propels pure vitriol at high velocities. Although its hatred (and damage output) is the weakest of the unbalanced weapons, its firerate is unrivaled.\n\nThe unbalanced rifle is a favorite of Torture Liquid Union empires, primarily because of the severe pain it inflicts.

A highly advanced shotgun that propels a large amount of pure-pain projectiles that excel at dominating armor. Its projectiles completely lack respect for armor, and as such just ignore it when murdering people.\n\nThe unbalanced shotgun is a favorite of Torture Liquid Union empires, primarily because of the severe pain it inflicts.

A highly advanced sniper that fires extremely hateful projectiles that punch straight through armor, and still have enough fury to blow off a limb or two. While it takes a while to rile itself up and fire, it can get the job done in just one shot.\n\nThe unbalanced sniper is a favorite of Torture Liquid Union empires, primarily because of the severe pain it inflicts.
